subject: Frauds and Swindling
Chess
lead_paragraph: Garry Kasparov promised money to a supporter who was expected to deliver votes needed for Kasparov’s election as president of the World Chess Federation, according to a draft contract reviewed by The Times.
snippet: Garry Kasparov promised money to a supporter who was expected to deliver votes needed for Kasparov’s election as president of the World Chess Federation, according to a draft contract reviewed by The Times.
